text: Bo Ingemar Erlandsson (16 November 1957 – 9 August 2022) was a Swedish footballer. He played as a defender. He represented Malmö FF between 1976 and 1987. Between 1978 and 1985, he scored two goals for the Sweden national team. Erlandsson died on 9 August 2022, at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swedish footballers
title: Ingemar Erlandsson
